short_summary: The main purpose of the project is for one (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist.
description: The main purpose of this tender is for the Task Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement of the Defense Ministry. This is a service requirement open to Canada-based companies. The company is required to provide task-based professional services in the field of quality assurance. The project will run for one year.",
full_summary:
**Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist**
===========================

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for task-based professional services for an Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist.

**Background**
------------

This requirement cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number W6369-23-X023/A dated January 5, 2023, with a closing date of January 24, 2023. The present solicitation is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 for the Life Cycle Management Specialist category.

**Services Required**
-------------------

DND requires one (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist to provide quality assurance related activities and on-site management support for the repair and overhaul or manufacturing of military components, equipment, and systems. The contract is intended to be for approximately one (1) year, plus three (3) one-year irrevocable options, allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Proposal Guidelines**
----------------------

Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders. Bidders should note that RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System (https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Timeline**
------------

* Proposed contract period: from date of contract to one year later
* Estimated level of effort: 240 days

**Security Requirements**
------------------------

The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles. Suppliers who wish to become qualified Supply Arrangement Holders may contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

Contracting Authority: Amy Lee Gönye, amy.leegonye@forces.gc.ca
File Number: W6369-23-X023/B

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

* Solicitation Number: W6369-23-X023/B
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Tender Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Halifax, Nova Scotia
